projects.name: BottleCRM
projects.description: BottleCRM is a dynamic, SaaS CRM platform designed to streamline the entire CRM needs of startups and enterprises. Built with modern web technologies including SvelteKit, Svelte 5, and Prisma, it offers a seamless experience for users through robust role-based access control (RBAC). Each user role is equipped with tailored functionalities to enhance efficiency, engagement, and management, ensuring a streamlined and secure business process.
